updates.description: Ajout du système de monitoring et rapports économiques
queries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `economy_reports` (`id` INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `report_type` ENUM('hourly', 'daily', 'weekly', 'monthly', 'custom') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'hourly', `report_data` JSON NOT NULL, `generated_at` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `generated_by` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'system', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `report_type` (`report_type`), KEY `generated_at` (`generated_at`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
ALTER TABLE `economy_logs` MODIFY COLUMN `source` ENUM('auto', 'admin', 'system', 'monitoring') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'auto';
